00053 // DataPlastSynapse definition
00054 // for synapses that share same weights and delays
00055 // contains a reference to the data
00057 
00058 class DataPlastSynapse
00059         : public DataIndivSynapse
00060 {
00061 // construction
00062 protected:
00063     explicit DataPlastSynapse(ConfigBase * const configurator);
00064 
00065 // members and accessors
00066 protected:
00067     inline const std::deque<Time> & preneuron_spike_list_impl() const {
00068         return *preneuron_spike_list_;
00069     }
00070     inline const std::deque<Time> & postneuron_spike_list_impl() const {
00071         return *postneuron_spike_list_;
00072     }
00073 private:
00074     std::deque<Time> * const preneuron_spike_list_ // pointer to the spike_list of the preneuron
00075     , * const postneuron_spike_list_; // pointer to the spike_list of the postneuron
00076 };

00081 // inline definitions

00085 // config constructor
00086 inline DataPlastSynapse::DataPlastSynapse(ConfigBase * const configurator)
00087         : DataIndivSynapse(configurator)
00088         , preneuron_spike_list_(dynamic_cast<DataPlastSynapseConfig *>(configurator)->preneuron_spike_list())
00089         , postneuron_spike_list_(dynamic_cast<DataPlastSynapseConfig *>(configurator)->postneuron_spike_list())
00090 {
00091     if (!(preneuron_spike_list_ && postneuron_spike_list_)) throw ConfigError("DataPlastSynapse: pre- or post-neuronspike_list_ not initialised");
00092 }
